reference.title: Server certificates
reference.shortdesc: Server certificates must be manually installed on each client on which an SSL connection to the server is established.

section.p: For information about securing a JMS client, see .
For information about securing MQTT clients, see the set of securing articles on the Mobile Messaging & M2M articles page of the IBM messaging community blog.

Complete the following steps to secure a JavaScript client:
Open a web browser.
Type the following information in the URL bar:https://ipaddress:port_number and press Enter.
Where: ipaddress The IP address where the endpoint is configured where the clients are going to connect.
port_number The endpoint port.
A warning is displayed saying that the certificate is not trusted.
Follow the prompts on the warning to accept the certificate.
